description: Once a mill, this restaurant still stands next to its old canal which lends the setting a delightful bucolic ambience echoed in the warm, welcoming dining room. Highlights on the menu include risottos, frog’s legs, snails and goose - based dishes, as well as cured meats. Inviting guestrooms complete this delightfully rustic picture.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
